reviewText: I had purchased all of these movies for digital download at half the price.  I didn't think I had downloaded all the Star Wars Lego movies so bought this. Well, turns out there aren't many and I already had them.  They are even better for adults than kids as most of the subtle jokes are aimed at the mature crowd.  I just wish I hadn't purchased these given I already "owned" them in digital form.
Enjoyable movie fun for the kids and Big Kid!
This rating is provided on behalf of my 7 year old nephew who I bought this for -- he loves it!!!!!
Grandkids have been playing often, keeps them entertained. Plus they have a variety to enjoy when they visit and weather doesn't permit outside play.
This set is awesome!  Got it for my son's 5th birthday and he loves it! We watch them all the time. All the time. All the time. Over and over. Over and over. Over and over.

I purchased this Set from Amazon for the great sale price of 23.49 with Free Prime Shipping and I am sure glad I did.

What I received from Amazon:

LEGO Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Out on DVD With Minifigure "Darth Vader with Metal"

LEGO Star Wars: The Padawan Menace Blu-ray/DVD Combo Pack With Minifigure "Young Han Solo"

LEGO Star Wars: The Yoda Chronicles on DVD

My 7 year old son is a major LEGO fan and a major Star Wars Fan so of course he Loved all of the programs. Funny action for adult fans and kid fans alike. These are not what you would call "canon" but they are all 3 were entertaining for my son and I.

I was thinking of purchasing this. However the image shows a mix of blu ray and DVD. Shows 1 disk in the product description and format DVD. So I went looking for the original versions on blu ray on amazon.  If you want blu ray it's about the same price to buy them individually on that format as compared to this DVD single disk bundle.
Fantastic. Lot of jokes for kids and Adults.
My 6 and nearly 8 year old sons were so happy!  They loved getting to watch Star Wars with mini figures so it's "not scary".  Overall, the movies are enjoyable for grown-ups too.
Love these Lego movies!!! Entertained me as well as my grandkids!
my grandson loves star wars and legos, he loves these movies, he is 7.
Our nephew (6 years old) loves this bundle.

My 6-year-old loved this package. A couple of the DVDs are a little shorter than I anticipated, but that was made up for by the extra Lego figures. I knew that the young Han Solo was there, but the Darth Vader was a surprise. It was a nice birthday treat.

A great addition to our 4-year-old's collection...he is absolutely crazy about LEGO Star Wars...and batman and spiderman!  He watches these videos every week...and I'm a Star Wars fan as well, so they're even fun for Dad!
